During the descent, he and another climber lost their way. They ended up on the Wintun Glacier. Travizano slipped and fell approximately 3,000 feet. A California Highway Patrol helicopter recovered his body. Officials warn climbers about the dangers of even the 'safer' routes.

description: Jaden Agassi and Catherine Holt celebrated their three-year anniversary on September 20, 2025, sharing heartfelt messages and photos on Instagram. The couple, who adopted a French bulldog named Rocky in June, also attended the US Open women’s singles final.

title: Lucknow mall: Bouncer shot, many injured after party continued past closing time
description: A late-night dispute at a Lucknow mall's club escalated into violence when a group, including a doctor, clashed with bouncers after refusing to end their party. One of the men allegedly shot a bouncer, injuring him and a colleague. Enraged bouncers retaliated, assaulting the group. Police arrested four individuals and recovered a licensed pistol and ammunition.

title: Bengaluru residents protest, demand pothole-free roads
description: Residents of Varthur and Gunjur are protesting for better roads. A recent death due to traffic has sparked outrage. People are demanding pothole-free and dust-free roads. The Karnataka Road Development Corporation Limited road widening project is delayed. Alternative routes are also in poor condition. Residents are frustrated with daily struggles and demand immediate action. Police intervened in protests outside residences.

title: Blindfolded cow pushed into drain; rescued by villagers in Haryana
description: In a disturbing incident near Jamal village, Sirsa, villagers discovered a cow blindfolded and struggling in a drain. Residents rescued the animal, which had been deliberately thrown into the water overnight. The cow is now under the care of the Maharishi Dayanand Saraswati Gaushala Committee, while villagers condemn the inhumane act and demand strict action against those responsible.

title: ‘Zero civic sense’: Tourists 'vandalise' Humayun’s Tomb in Delhi
description: A video showing visitors allegedly vandalising Humayun's Tomb, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, has sparked outrage online. The footage shows a young man scribbling on a wall while others film. While some shots appear to be from other locations, ASI officials confirmed parts of the video were from the tomb.

title: Triple whammy for India after tariffs and Chabahar
Rift widens in Lalu family as Rohini unfollows RJD, kin
description: The internal conflict within Lalu Prasad's family has intensified with Rohini Acharya unfollowing key family members and the RJD on social media due to disagreements over Tejashwi Yadav's associate, Sanjay Yadav. Tej Pratap Yadav has defended Rohini, escalating the family feud

title: H-1B visa hike: JPMorgan asks staff to return to US before Sept 21
description: JPMorgan and Microsoft are urging H-1B visa holders to return to the U.S. immediately due to President Trump's new directive imposing a $100,000 annual fee on companies for each H-1B worker. This move, effective September 21st, is anticipated to disproportionately impact Indian IT firms like Infosys and TCS, who heavily rely on H-1B visas to deploy professionals in the U.S.

title: Gracie Hunt’s Update: From heartfelt message to romance with Green; Chiefs heiress stays strong
description: Gracie Hunt, the Kansas City Chiefs' heiress, shared heartwarming photos on Instagram from a wedding she attended with her boyfriend, Derek Green. The couple, who have known each other since childhood through their families' connection to the Chiefs, looked deeply in love. Hunt expressed her views on love and faith in the post's caption, emphasizing its importance in daily life.
